001package Calibration_Plugins_2;
002
003import ij.IJ;
004import ij.ImagePlus;
005import ij.ImageStack;
006import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
007import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
008import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
009import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.data.CalibrationImage;
010import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.data.ZhangData;
011import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Camera;
012import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.InterCameraMapping;
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
014import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
015import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
016import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
017
018import java.util.Locale;
019
020import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.splitLines;
021
022
023/**
024 * This plugin opens an image stack containing the 5 Zhang test images (assumed to be taken with camera A) and
025 * re-renders the images by mapping them to a new camera B. In this example, only the lens distortion coefficients are
026 * modified but in principle all intrinsic parameters of camera B could be changed.
027 *
028 * @author W. Burger
029 * @version 2021-08-22
030 */
031public class Replace_Camera_Demo implements PlugIn {
032
033        private static ImageResource resource = CalibrationImage.CalibImageStack;
034
035        // modified lens distortion coefficients:
036        private static double k1 = -0.1;
037        private static double k2 =  2.0;
038
039        public void run(String arg0) {
040                // open the test image (stack): 
041                ImagePlus testIm = resource.getImagePlus();
042
043                if (testIm == null) {
044                        IJ.error("Could not open calibration images!");
045                        return;
046                }
047                testIm.show();
048
049                // get the camera intrinsics (typically by calibration):
050                Camera cameraA = ZhangData.getCameraIntrinsics();
051
052                double[] cameraParameters = cameraA.getParameterVector();
053                k1 = cameraParameters[5];
054                k2 = cameraParameters[6];
055
056                if (!runDialog()) {
057                        return;
058                }
059
060                cameraParameters[5] = k1;       // change only radial distortion parameters
061                cameraParameters[6] = k2;
062
063                Camera cameraB = new Camera(cameraParameters);
064
065                // create a special geometric mapping
066                Mapping2D mapping = new InterCameraMapping(cameraA, cameraB);   // inverse, maps target to source
067
068                // rectify the images and create a new stack:
069                ImageStack distStack = testIm.getStack();
070                final int w = distStack.getWidth();
071                final int h = distStack.getHeight();
072                final int M = distStack.getSize();
073
074                ImageStack rectStack = new ImageStack(w, h);
075                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
076                        IJ.showProgress(i, M);
077                        ImageProcessor source = distStack.getProcessor(i + 1);
078                        ImageProcessor target = source.createProcessor(w, h);
079                        ImageMapper mapper = new ImageMapper(mapping, null, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic);
080                        mapper.map(source, target);
081//                      mapping.applyTo(source, target, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic);
082                        rectStack.addSlice("frame"+ (i + 1), target);
083                }
084
085                new ImagePlus(testIm.getShortTitle() + " (modfied)", rectStack).show();
086        }
087
088        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
089
090        private boolean runDialog() {
091                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
092                gd.setInsets(0, 0, 0);
093                gd.addMessage(splitLines(60,
094                                "This plugin transforms the stack of test images by replacing",
095                                "the original camera by a new camera with different parameters.",
096                                "Only the radial distortion parameters (κ1, κ2) are changed.",
097                                "For example, try κ1 = -0.1, κ2 = 2.0."));
098
099                gd.addNumericField("Rad. distortion param. κ1", k1, 3);
100                gd.addNumericField("Rad. distortion param. κ2", k2, 3);
101
102                gd.showDialog();
103                if (gd.wasCanceled())
104                        return false;
105
106                k1 = gd.getNextNumber();
107                k2 = gd.getNextNumber();
108                return true;
109        }
110
111}
